name: TouchModTime
author: You
about: After a successful download/unpack, update the modification time of all files in the final directory to the current time.
requirements: POSIX shell with `find`, `xargs`, and `touch` available (BusyBox/Alpine OK).
description: Recursively touches all regular files in NZBPP_FINALDIR (if set) or NZBPP_DIRECTORY to set their mtime to now.
Useful for media indexers that sort by modified date.
